snippet.title: Tour de France 2013 standings: Christopher Froome strengthens grasp on yellow jersey
snippet.description:
Tour de France 2013 standings: Christopher Froome strengthens grasp on yellow jersey by Louis Bien on Jul 14 2013, 11:30a
Chris Froome leads by over four minutes atop the general classification at the 2013 Tour de France.

snippet.title: Tour de France 2013 results, Stage 15: Chris Froome wins atop Mont Ventoux
snippet.description:
Tour de France 2013 results, Stage 15: Chris Froome wins atop Mont Ventoux by Louis Bien on Jul 14 2013, 10:55a
Chris Froome won the grueling Stage 15 climb to the top of Mont Ventoux, and now has a commanding hold on the yellow jersey at the 2013 Tour de France.

snippet.title: Lance Armstrong Responds to El Pistolero
snippet.description:
Lance Armstrong Responds to El Pistolero by Spencer Hall on Jul 28 2009, 2:00p
